A smarter, healthier way to feed your best friend.

  • A diet tailored for your dog & formulated by vets
  • We only use the best, natural & healthy ingredients
  • Suitable for all dogs, including dogs with allergies
  • Human Grade
  • Approved by Vets
  • Personalised, Ready-to-serve A customised plan is tailored to your dogâ€™s individual needs. Easy ready-to-serve meals are pre-made and pre-portioned. Just open and scoop!
  • Made fresh and delivered Your food is delivered to you within days of cooking. Never deep frozen. Never stored on a shelf for months.
  • Real food Free of animal by-products, slaughter waste, artificial additives, chemicals and preservatives.
  • Human-grade Our food is cooked in a human-grade facility following HACCP food standards.

Our Recipes

Beef and Vegetables

Beef muscle meat, beef heart, beef kidney, sweet potato, beef liver, peas, potato, carrot, spinach, chia seeds, dicalcium phosphate, blueberries, calcium carbonate, iodized salt, zinc gluconate, basil, vitamin E supplement, pyridoxine hydrochloride (Vitamin B6), riboflavin (Vitamin B2)

Chicken and Vegetables

Chicken muscle meat, chicken liver, chia seed, long grain rice, spinach, carrot, green peas, potato, blueberries, dicalcium phosphate, calcium carbonate, fish oil, iodized salt, zinc gluconate, basil, rosemary, vitamin E, pyridoxine hydrochloride (Vitamin B6), riboflavin (Vitamin B2)

Suppliments

for only an extra 40c a day!

Just like people, pets also require adequate vitamins and minerals to remain fit, happy and healthy. This means supplementing their food intake with extra vitamins and minerals. Our supplements are derived from 100% real, raw ingredients that are designed to help strengthen the joints, protect and condition the skin and coat, improve digestive health, and for overall well-being. Our supplements consist of a mix of high-quality fish oil, mineral mix and plant flakes.
